title: Strengthening Web Development Practice Competencies: Digital Resource Evaluation Capabilities for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Apply rubric-based quality evaluation criteria for Educational Digital Resources (EDR) with over 90% accuracy.
Identify and determine whether digital resources for mathematics education align with specific instructional design models with over 80% accuracy.
Select and propose at least three optimal digital resources through a team-based collaborative system based on evaluation results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
